title: rdpmonster
author: rdpmonster
created_time: June 26, 2023, 06:50:01 PMLast edit: February 18, 2025, 12:32:45 PM by rdpmonster
content: rdp.monster - Cheap, High-Performance, Anonymous HostingWindows VPS (RDP), Linux VPS (Debian, CentOS, KaliLinux, Ubuntu...), Dedicated Servers, DomainsFully automatic deployment directly after your payment !We offer VPS, RDP (Windows), dedicated servers, and domain name registration‚Äîall without requiring any personal information. üöÄOur services are designed for quality, security, and anonymity! üîíüñ•Ô∏è Our different rates for USA / Europe VPS offers:These packages feature powerful Xeon processors (from Intel Xeon 2680v4 to Intel Xeon 2690v4), high-reliability DDR4 ECC RAM, and NVMe storage‚Äîdelivering strong, dependable performance! üöÄBasic - 6 GB RAM DDR4 ECC - 2 vCore - 40 GB SSD NVMe - Port 1 GB/s - Traffic ‚àû - All ports open, KVM Virtualization. Price : $8.99Standard - 8 GB RAM DDR4 ECC - 4 vCore - 70 GB SSD NVMe - Port 1 GB/s - Traffic ‚àû - All ports open, KVM Virtualization.
